charinfo.name: Konan (S)
charinfo.description: Konan (S) is a member of Akatsuki and a master of origami ninjutsu, earning her the title God's Angel in Amegakure. Able to turn her body into thick sheets of paper, she is capable of multiple forms of attack. Original Design: oreacharound

abilities.name: Paper Cut
abilities.description: Using Paper Cut Konan (S) deals 25 piercing damage to 1 enemy.

abilities.name: Origami Blanket
abilities.description: Konan (S) covers one enemy in paper. For 2 turns that enemy has their physical and mental skills stunned, will be invulnerable to all new friendly skills, and takes 15 damage each turn. During this time Paper Cut will deal an additional 5 damage to that enemy.

abilities.name: Dance of the Shikigami
abilities.description: Konan (S) uses Dance Of The Shikigami dealing 25 damage to one enemy and 25 to a random different enemy.

abilities.name: Onmyoji Dodge
abilities.description: This skill makes Konan (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
